entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rancheria
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023
